Name: Spiky Shield
Effect: Target Self. Priority 3. Shield Move. Reduce 3 Damage this Pokémon would receive from a Damaging Move. If the Foe used a Non-ranged Physical Move, Roll 2 Dice of Typeless Damage against it. Ignore defenses.
Description: The Pokémon bunkers themselves inside a shield of thorned brambles sprouting from the ground. Anyone who gets too close will get tangled in the spiky vines.
